title: TCL adds AirPlay 2 and Homekit to its refreshed Google TV lineup
content:
Last year TCL launched itself into the Google TV experience with a batch of pretty solid 4K TVs. Earlier this month, the brand refreshed that lineup in Europe, and one detail that flew under the radar until now is that the entire lineup is equipped with support for Apple’s AirPlay 2 and Homekit.

more…

The post TCL adds AirPlay 2 and Homekit to its refreshed Google TV lineup appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: TCL has just confirmed that its 2022 Google TV lineup will, at least in Europe, be adding support for Apple's AirPlay 2 and Homekit.
